snippet: The $131 million sale of WBLS-FM and WLIB will align some of New York’s most popular stations specializing in black music.
abstract: Emmis Communications is buying WBLS-FM and WLIB from YMF Media for $131 million; deal will align some of New York's most popular stations specializing in black music; Emmis owns hip-hop station WQHT-FM, better known as Hot 97.
lead_paragraph: The $131 million sale of WBLS-FM and WLIB will align some of New York’s most popular stations specializing in black music.

headline.main: Hot 97’s Owner in Deal for 2 Other Stations
headline.print_headline: Hot 97’s Owner in Deal for 2 Other Stations
